original_text: The Ammonites brought tribute to Uzziah, and his fame spread as far as the border of Egypt, because he had become very powerful.
korean_text: 암몬 사람들이 웃시야에게 조공을 바치매 웃시야가 매우 강성하여 이름이 애굽 변방까지 퍼졌더라

sentences.original_text: The Ammonites brought tribute to Uzziah
and his fame spread as far as the border of Egypt
because he had become very powerful
